item.title: How to Setup Weechat Relay on Openbsd
item.description: This document is the specification of WeeChat Relay protocol: the protocol used to relay WeeChat data to clients, which are mostly remote interfaces. In this document, relay means WeeChat with relay plugin, which acts as “server” and allows clients to connect. Client mean the program you used to connect to your relay. To use Weechat and Weechat Relay on OpenBSD you would need to follow those steps: Note: Start this on tmux then you can detach from it and use it as a relay from glowing bear web interface
